channel.title: You going to let this happen?
channel.description: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,548068.0.html Mrs Mopman is trying to take away your freedom

item.title: You going to let this happen?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“DEFET, post:10, topic:445618”]You know, this whole topic reminds me of the 9gag/funnyjunk/4chan/reddit conflict all over again, and that’s why i abandoned those retarded sites. Please don’t reenact them at such levels.

In all seriousness I don’t really understand why the boards are separated; I came here because these topics interest me more, but obviously the community isn’t as broad. Moparscape is the name and reason where most of the traffic is from, not some dictatorship discussion forum known as MITB. If we merged, then the could just set different categories… and please save me now if that’s not how categories are used.

Unless this particular forum really wants to stay isolated with eachother, then let it be, but I don’t see a reason why we shouldn’t allow others to attempt to blend in, they can just be ignored.

just my 2 euros[/quote]
well, they target different audiences (to a degree)
the MITB community is (mostly) made up of people who have been around the runescape scene for quite a while (and, to my knowledge, have mostly left it) - it’s now, in my opinion, more of a community built around it’s member base than a traditional forum. mscp, on the other hand, is more of a traditional forum - the member base is not small and relatively tight knit, rather it is unified by a central idea (private servers), with other topics coming up around that (it’s been years since i’ve been to that side of the forum, but i believe they have general discussion now too? i’m too lazy to get past the TOS page).

tl;dr: mitb is mostly unified by its member base and a range of topics, while mscp is mostly unified by its central topic and grew from there, with the member base not being central to ‘daily life’

of course, i could be completely wrong, but that’s just my impression of it

Read full topic
item.source: You going to let this happen?

item.title: You going to let this happen?
item.dc:creator: @DEFET DEFET
item.description:
@DEFET wrote:

You know, this whole topic reminds me of the 9gag/funnyjunk/4chan/reddit conflict all over again, and that’s why i abandoned those retarded sites. Please don’t reenact them at such levels.

In all seriousness I don’t really understand why the boards are separated; I came here because these topics interest me more, but obviously the community isn’t as broad. Moparscape is the name and reason where most of the traffic is from, not some dictatorship discussion forum known as MITB. If we merged, then the could just set different categories… and please save me now if that’s not how categories are used.

Unless this particular forum really wants to stay isolated with eachother, then let it be, but I don’t see a reason why we shouldn’t allow others to attempt to blend in, they can just be ignored.

just my 2 euros
